ingredients: 1 (28-ounce) can of tomatillos, drained, or 15 fresh husked tomatillos broiled until charred
1 large handful cilantro, including stems, plus additional 1/4 cup leaves, chopped for garnish
1 tablespoon fresh-squeezed lemon or lime juice
1 (4-ounce) can diced jalapenos, preferably fire-roasted, drained
